wikipedia_page.main: Sir Walter Roberts  (14 December 1893 – 18 November 1978) was a British diplomat. He was the only son of His Honour Judge Roberts, a Judge of the Clerkenwell County Court.

response: * Walter Roberts (American football) (born 1942), former American football player
